title: Pickle Party
description: The long awaited new collection from born-weird author D.B.Tarpley is finally here. 25 tender morsels of Hellish delight wait to titillate and debase your childish curiosity. A morbid meditation on humor and what makes us laugh, 'Pickle Party' stands alone amidst a sea of literary trifle holding a banner high above its head which boldly declares, "the same thing that will make you laugh will make you cry." Pick up your copy today. You know you want to. Ain't nothing stopping you but fear and atmosphere. You're a bitch if you don't.
author: D.B. Tarpley
